document_data.name: Bat-people hills and caverns
document_data.mainbody: A range of '''unnamed cavernous hills''' that sporadically shifted between the [[Domains of Dread]] and the [[Prime Material]] world of [[Toril]]. They were home to a monstrous race of [[bat]]-like [[humanoid]]s simply called the [[bat-people]].{{Cite organized play/LC/A Goodly Apple|9}}<ref group="note" name="location">It is not specified exactly where in the Domains of Dread that the hills originate.
document_data.Geography: These hills always appeared in [[the Vast]] region of [[north Faerûn]], though at a different spot each time. Whatever land and people were present in the spot the hills manifested upon would be temporarily displaced into the Domains of Dread.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some speculated that the [[Dark Powers]] might be responsible for the shifting nature of the caves, possibly as some ploy to draw more unwary people into the Domains of Dread.
